boot_command_suffix: /base/preseed.cfg <wait> auto debian-installer=en_US <wait> locale=en_US keymap=us <wait> netcfg/get_hostname=localhost <wait> netcfg/get_domain=local <wait> fb=false <wait> debconf/frontend=noninteractive <wait> console-setup/ask_detect=false <wait> console-keymaps-at/keymap=us <wait> grub-installer/bootdev=/dev/sda <enter>
